Package util

Class SoundManager

java.lang.Object
util.SoundManager
public class SoundManager extends Object
SoundManager class manages the audio in the game. It contains methods for playing or stopping audio clips. Also provides methods for adjusting the volume.
Author:
Batuhan Tuncer

  • Constructor Details

    • SoundManager

      public SoundManager() throws UnsupportedAudioFileException, IOException, LineUnavailableException
      Loads all the clips played in the game
      Throws:
      UnsupportedAudioFileException - invalid file format
      IOException - error during reading
      LineUnavailableException - error during reading
